'''Rómendacil I''' ({{TA|310}}<ref name="Elendil">{{PM|Elendil}}, manuscript C, The Southern Line of Gondor: the Anarioni, 8. Romendakil I</ref> – {{TA|541|n}},<ref>{{App|South}}, ''Kings of Gondor'', Rómendacil I (Tarostar), p. 1038</ref> aged 231 years) was born '''Tarostar''', the son of [[Ostoher]], the [[King of Gondor]].<ref name="Gondor">{{App|Gondor}}, entry for Kings Ostoher, Tarostar and Turambar, p. 1044</ref> He in turn would become the eighth King of Gondor,<ref>{{App|South}}, ''Kings of Gondor'', p. 1038</ref> ruling for 49 years, from Third Age 492<ref>{{App|South}}, ''Kings of Gondor'', Ostoher, p. 1038</ref> until his untimely death.

==History==
In {{TA|490}} the first invasion of [[Easterlings]]<ref>{{App|TA}}, entry for the year 490, p. 1085</ref> fell upon [[Gondor]]<ref name="Gondor"/>. Tarostar defeated the invaders in {{TA|500}}<ref>{{App|TA}}, entry for the year 500, p. 1085</ref> and drove them from Gondor<ref name="Gondor"/>. After his victory against the Easterlings Tarostar assumed the name Rómendacil, "East-victor".<ref name="Gondor"/>

After the first assault of the Easterlings, Rómendacil ordered that the "Tradition of Isildur" be set down in a sealed scroll, to be delivered by the [[Steward of Gondor]] to the King's heir before his crowning.<ref>{{UT|Tradition}}</ref>

Rómendacil's triumph did not end the Easterling threat. In {{TA|541}} Rómendacil was killed in a battle<ref>{{App|TA}}, entry for the year 541, p. 1085</ref> against new hordes of Easterlings<ref name="Gondor"/>. His son [[Turambar (King of Gondor)|Turambar]] avenged him and conquered much territory eastwards.<ref name="Gondor"/>

==Etymology==
''Tarostar'' is [[Quenya]].<ref>{{App|Men}}, footnote, p. 1128</ref> Its meaning is not glossed, but as Paul Strack explains, it might mean "King of the Lands" and be a compound of [[tar]] ("high, king") and the plural form of [[sta]] ("land").<ref>{{webcite|author=Paul Strack|articleurl=https://www.eldamo.org/content/words/word-1351380809.html|articlename=Q. ''Tarostar'' m.|website=Eldamo|accessed=28 July 2021}}</ref>

''Rómendacil'' is [[Quenya]]. It means "East-victor".<ref name="Gondor"/> It is a compound of [[rómen]] ("east") and [[-ndacil|-(n)dacil]] ("victor").<ref>{{webcite|author=Paul Strack|articleurl=https://www.eldamo.org/content/words/word-891723029.html|articlename=Q. ''Rómendacil'' m.|website=Eldamo|accessed=28 July 2021}}</ref>
